title: Eliminates the requirement for parental consent to an adoption when the parent has an order of protection against them for the protection of the other parent
actClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law, in relation to eliminating the requirement of a parent to consent to the adoption of his or her child when such parent has had an order of protection issued against him or her for the protection of the other parent, a person having lawful custody of such child or the child
